channel.title: Christmas Calendar [2019]
channel.description:
**Merry Christmas! I had an idea. What if, every day until Christmas, a special event hosted by someone new took place?**
|Date|Event|Host| |---|---|---|---| |1st of December|Setting up the Tree (no event) |2nd of December|Undetermined
**Please link your event to this page.**

item.title: Christmas Calendar [2019]
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
There is no limit to what the Event can be; a Forum Match, a Misc, whatever.
